sentence: Back in the 1950s, it banned the music-hall comedian Max Miller and his song Let's Have A Ride On Your Bicycle, due to its 'outrageous' lyrics: After the ride I began to perspire It wasn't the ride, I'd been pumping her tyre Innocent days.

title: Ofcom chief demands to regulate Netflix over Jimmy Carr Gypsy joke: Pressure piles on US streaming giant as 16,000 sign petition calling for comic's show to be removed while theatres are urged to CANCEL his upcoming comedy gigs
